parameters.name: roomSize
parameters.description: Controls the size of the reverb space (0% = small room, 100% = large hall)

parameters.name: damping
parameters.description: Controls high frequency absorption (0% = bright, 100% = dark)

parameters.name: wetLevel
parameters.description: Controls the level of reverb signal mixed with the input

parameters.name: dryLevel
parameters.description: Controls the level of direct (unprocessed) signal
